releaseNotes:
Ready for updates? In this version:
• AI Avatars are available for cats and dogs
• Skin tone options for human avatars added
• You have the ability to increase avatar resolution to 2048х2048 px (available on iPhone XS and later)
• Photos not depicting a face cannot be used to create avatars
• If you’re using the app for free and an image gets blurred due to explicit content, you can try generating again without watching an ad

We love getting feedback from you! Please leave your reviews so we can keep making the app even better.
description:
Want to create mesmerizing artwork? Or looking for a way to visualize your wildest ideas? AI Art has got you covered! 

This art generator creates unique images based on text prompts. Forget about the struggles of hiking through the web in search of the image or the tools you would need to make your own design. All you need to do is to describe your idea; AI Art will take care of the rest!

► Turn words into art
Want to see a BBQ party on Mars or a group of cats having a tea ceremony? Or maybe you're wondering what lies in the far corners of our universe? AI Art can show you all that and more! 

Trained with millions of images from the web, this powerful generator will transform your dreams into visual art in a matter of seconds! Simply type in what you have on your mind, and the AI will generate remarkable pictures that match your description.

► Explore art styles
AI Art has mastered a variety of art styles and techniques: from cartoonish pencil sketches to mind-blowing photorealism. Experiment with styles and see which one captures your idea best.

► Create art from images
If you have an exact concept of what your painting should look like, you may add an image as a visual base for your prompt. Upload a photo or select one from our library, and the AI will transform it into a masterpiece tailored to your vision. Try out different inputs to see your ideas from different angles!

► Generate avatars
Take your selfies to the next level using AI magic. Upload your photos to generate your portraits in various settings, eras, and styles. Try on the roles of an epic comic-style superhero, a cool cyborg from the future, a 90s rock star, and more.

► Get inspired
Get an extra boost of inspiration browsing a gallery of amazing images generated by AI artists from all over the world. Explore the ideas of others and get your creative juices flowing!

You can use a free trial with all features available.

UNLIMITED ACCESS MEMBERSHIP SUBSCRIPTION
• You can subscribe for unlimited access to all features within the app.
• Subscriptions are billed weekly or annually at the rate selected depending on the subscription plan.
 
All personal data is protected in accordance with the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy:
https://aiby.mobi/ai_art_ios/privacy
https://aiby.mobi/ai_art_ios/terms
